name: Dharshana Gamage
bio: Hewawasam Gamage Dharshana Nayanakantha (born March 2, 1979), either spelt as Dharshana Nayanakantha or Dharshana Gamage, is a former Sri Lankan cricketer.[1] He is a right-handed batsman and a right-arm medium-fast bowler. He studied at the Prince of Wales' College, Moratuwa. He is currently serving as the assistant coach of Sri Lanka Emerging cricket team.[2][3][4]
